long_description: The Look S-Track mountain bike pedals offer a low-profile design with easy dual-side entry and a large surface contact area for efficient performance on the trails. Low-profile composite pedal bodies help keep weight down and offer resilient trail performance; dual-side entry makes for hassle-free clipping in. Large surface contact area delivers excellent power transfer efficiency; stainless-steel protection plates help ensure lasting use. When clipped in, you'll have  3deg of angular float and  1mm of side-to-side float, providing a solid connection with some degree of comfortable movement. Mud-shedding design ensures you can clip in and out with minimal hassle from gunked up cleats; 15deg release angle. Stout chromoly axles ensure strong, lasting performance. Look S-Trak bike pedals include pedals, cleats and cleat mounting hardware; cleats fit most shoes with SPD-style, 2-hole mounts.
short_description: The Look S-Track mountain bike pedals offer a low-profile design with easy dual-side entry and a large surface contact area for efficient performance on the trails.
